website_summaries.verdict: Soft, medium-sized powder puffs that are as versatile as they are well made.
pros: Crafted of sponge material covered in soft velour
4-inch size is perfect for blending makeup and dusting powder all over the body
Finger straps make puffs easy to use
Pack of 3 is a good value
cons: Powder tends to fall off the puffs fairly easily
If you need puffs for a compact, these won't fit

customer_reviews.title: basic
customer_reviews.text: Just needed a plain ol' plain ol' and that's what this is. Affordable and mailed right to my door. It's not the easy-to-find item on my regular shopping list. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Small

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I use this powder puff for my setting powder that I need to apply on my liquid foundation so it will set and dry properly on my face. The outside fluffy material is soft enough so my powder will stick to it, and the sponge inside the powder puff is spongy enough to help prevent freshly applied make up from rubbing off and not sticking to the sponge. It is a bit "fat" but the sponginess compensates and can fit between the space between your eye and the bridge of your nose.
customer_reviews.author: biokid

customer_reviews.title: SOFT BUT PRACTICAL
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to use with my body powder, and the ability to wash them when they need it is a 100% plus for me. I lost my other set of puffs to the mildew of a local flood and I was very happy to find these by Topwan to replace them. They are identical in quality to the ones I lost.
customer_reviews.author: JUNEBUG51

customer_reviews.title: Very soft, great size and smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: This topwon are the absolute best!!! Great size and is very very soft! It also smells amazing for some reason I needed it for my baby powder And i am very glad i got this ones I definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Dayana

customer_reviews.title: A 4-inch width powder puff, larger than what is availble in the stores.
customer_reviews.text: The product is what it is as described in item description. It came on time and as promised. It is the width I've been looking for which is a plus! Better yet it comes as a 3-pack powder puff, 2 extra puffs for future use.
customer_reviews.author: GSM

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I commend the seller for packaging the 3 poofs separately. I like that. The poofs are a bit stiff, but other than that, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Metzler

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement puff.
customer_reviews.text: Love these, looked all over town and couldn’t find replacements. These are perfect and fit just right into your round canister of powder. Omg of 3, and I gave one to my daughter and granddaughter who are quite happy with their new puffs too.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Great value....
customer_reviews.text: I use the powder puffs to apply body powder. Very nice puffs and more fluffy than expected.
customer_reviews.author: icaex4295

customer_reviews.title: Magic Puff
customer_reviews.text: It's a no brainers the puffs are more ty than fantastic I recommend Cotys loose powder to use with this puff for a flawless finish...

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: These puffs are super soft, the perfect size and they’re washable, which is a nice bonus. They were also packaged in a heavyweight resealable bag. I’d definitely buy these again!

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for putting your makeup on, I use to put on my foundation, concealer, and powder. My makeup seems more smooth with this.

customer_reviews.title: Very good for baby powder!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. They are big and very soft. Perfect for baby powder. Nice packaging and good quality, fair pricing. Definitely recommend for baby or adult.

customer_reviews.text: These puffs are the right size and thickness to satisfy me. They are soft and fluff my powder on me very nicely. Really good quality for the price.

customer_reviews.title: They are very soft and glides on skin

customer_reviews.title: Very soft.
customer_reviews.text: These powder puffs are very soft. Powder goes on smoothly and where I want it to. I also like that each puff is put in it's own resealable bag. The extra puffs stay clean and fresh until I need it.

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, gloriously soft to the touch, and soothing to the skin. Love these powder puffs!
customer_reviews.author: skh

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I like the versatility of these large Puffs in that they are not only soft but have a finger through grip and also are washable so that you may use them and any area of your body with after bath dusting powder or talc. Good for adjusting baby's bottom to prevent diaper rash or adults underarms, bra line, feet or "private areas" and, with three sponges you can dedicate one for exclusive use to a particular area even though they're washable
customer_reviews.author: Kackiecnm

customer_reviews.title: Great puffs
customer_reviews.text: Soft and easy to use with the ribbon on the back to slide your hand through. Have not washed but should do fine in a lingerie bag in a washing machine. Keeps powder from the air and landing all over the floor and room, which is what I needed. Great buy!

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Expected
customer_reviews.text: In the hot weather, I like to pat bath powder on my body to make me feel cooler especially after my shower. These are the right size, very soft and work well.

customer_reviews.title: Glad to find them - and buy them
customer_reviews.text: Glad I could get these on Amazon, because no pharmacy sells them anymore. They just sell those dinky foam things. These are great. Not at all flimsy.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my powder box, appears well made & very soft. Would have given a 5 if it held more body powder like the "shaggier" puffs do.

product_meta.title: Topwon 4 Inch Powder Puff,Washable Large Body Powder Puff,Soft & Furry - 3Pcs
feature_bullets: SOFT&COMFORTABLE: This powder puff is made of velor and cushiony sponge. Delicate and smooth touching, soft and velvety. suitable for talcum powder, loose powder,body powder and shading powder. These 4'' Powder puffs are perfect for covering large area and getting at the places powder needs to go.Big size for dusting powder!

WASHABLE PUFFS: You can wash it by hands or washing machine. Pls put it into the laundry bag then use the machine to wash it. Pls be advise that don't wash it with your other dark colors clothes, becuase it;s easy to get dyeing. After wash it just hanging it in the place of air ventilation to make it dry.

BECAUSE YOU DESERVE THE BEST: The nice quality powder puffs are very suitable for sensitive skin. You can use it whatever you are oily skin, normal skin,dry skin, combination skin. You can use it as face puff or body puff, as you like.

TAKE CARE OF YOUR BABY'S SKIN: Large powder puff are pretty suitable for baby and women, perfect as body powder puff, face powder puff and bath powder puff. The smooth and soft fluffy surface can make your baby feel better. You should choose this body puffs for your baby. It's a good choice! They're a great addition to a bath & body gift basket or to use with your favorite powders.
3 PCS POWDER PUFF: Velour facial powder puff, makeup puffs for powder, body powder puff. You will get 3 of it individually sealed in plastic. Powder puff size: 4''*0.6'' diameter/width.
